description:
#TurnOffTheNews & #Research5G
So the latest reports coming out of hospitals with patients suffering from severe respiratory problems associated with #Covid19 is that the respirators are doing very little to combat the patients inability to to absorb oxygen into the blood, which is NOT common to pneumonia like health complications which """"authorities"""" have compared the CV respiratory symptoms too but more likely associated with a disturbance to the body's ability to absorb oxygen; which can be directly attributed to the fact the the frequency range in which the newly launched #5G technology operates at, 60GHz, is also the absorption spectrum at which oxygen binds to hemoglobin in the blood which then carries the oxygen throughout the blood and to the rest of the body, indicating that #5GTechnology may very well be the culprit for the percieved respitory problems associated with the CV. We are not being told the truth by mainstream media and the people on the frontlines working in hospitals are just as clueless as to what is really going on right now as the general public but more and more healthcare professionals are coming out and saying the something is not right about what we are being told about this """"virus,"""" which may very well be a cover-up for the fact that the HIGHLY OPPOSSED & DANGEROUS 5G TECHNOLOGY is the real culprit behind this """"pandemic"""" as all the health effects associated with CV can be directly attributed to 5G, and do not simply take my word for it, GO RESEARCH YOURSELF, YOU HAVE THE TIME!!
